title: By the Queene. A proclamation for keeping the terme at Hartford Castle, and for adiournement of the same fron Mense Michaelis, vntill Crastino Animarum
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publisher: By the deputies of Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
